description: The Department of National Defence (DND) require the services of one (1) Draftsperson/Illustrator, Senior Level
full_summary:
# Draftsperson / Illustrator, Senior (TSPS) Requirement

**Solicitation Information**

* Solicitation Number: W6431-240127/A
* Publication Date: December 6, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 4, 2024, at 14:00 (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025, with the option to extend for four (4) one-year periods.

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Details**

A Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) requirement is being sought by the Department of National Defence (DND) to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), 1 Canadian Air Division (1 CAD), Instrument Approach Procedure Design Cell Terminal Procedures (TERPS) in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

**Security Requirements**

The successful bidder must have a Secret clearance and meet the resource minimum security level required.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement

**Level of Effort**

The estimated level of effort for this contract is 240 days per year.

**Ministry of Defence Requirements**

The requirement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 5.1 Draftsperson/Illustrator, Senior Level.

**Submission Instructions**

Respondents must submit their proposal electronically. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Point of Contact**

Renee Davis
Department of National Defence
Contact Information:
Phone: (343) 645-5490
Email: [Renee.Davis@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Renee.Davis@forces.gc.ca)

Note: The TSPS method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.
